content.prompt: Which of the following best describes a similarity between Wilentz’s and the Edsalls’s arguments about political change in the 1980s?

choices.label: Both interpretations emphasize the role of party leadership in prompting political realignments.
Both interpretations identify a movement of White working-class voters away from the Democratic Party.
Both interpretations suggest tax policies as a factor contributing to conservative victories.
Both interpretations emphasize the role of the Vietnam War in alienating voters from the party establishments.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
